profile.name: Emanuel
profile.title: CyberSecurity & Cloud | Software Engineer
profile.description:
I have five years of experience in cybersecurity, risk analysis and data protection. My experience allowed me to deploy security solutions that significantly improved the security of the companies I worked with and minimised the risks of cyber attacks.
As a passionate cybersecurity professional, I am always updating my knowledge on the latest trends and techniques in the field. I collaborate with teams to ensure that security is a priority in all aspects of business. Throughout my career, I have achieved significant results, including VPN migrations, Firewall installation, and equipment migration to Datacenter.
In summary, as a cybersecurity specialist, I am committed to providing effective solutions to ensure that companies are protected against cyber attacks and other security risks.

* Bilingual (Spanish and English)
* Residency Status: Stamp 2 Irish Visa (Permitted to work in Ireland part time)
* Currently based in Ireland

location.notes: Autocompleted using Google Maps API (id: ChIJL6wn6oAOZ0gRoHExl6nHAAo)

organization.name: Banco de la Provincia de Córdoba S.A.

challenges.description: In my role as a Security Analyst, I prioritise daily tasks which involve edge security, email security, antivirus, load balancers and secure browsing. I possess the ability to manage various cybersecurity tools, which includes Cisco ISE, ESA, Cognitive, WSA, ASA, FTD and Umbrella. I have experience using Citrix NetScaler, Dell/Quest Change Auditor, Dell/EMC Isilon, IBM QRadar (SIEM) and Symantec Endpoint Protection Manager.

As a System Administrator, I have expertise in a wide range of tasks that focus on ensuring smooth server operations and optimal performance. My skills include:
*Managing Linux and Windows servers to ensure their smooth operation and proper configuration.
*Proficient in SIP, VoIP, and Radius analysis, debugging, error reporting, and scenario-based development, while providing exceptional customer support.
Providing passive server on-call service to ensure continuous protection of critical systems.
Skilled in migrating SQL Server databases (2003/2008/2012) to preserve data integrity and accessibility.
Using Zabbix for server monitoring to promptly detect and solve issues, thereby sustaining uptime and efficiency.
Skilled in packet analysis using Wireshark on Windows to investigate and troubleshoot network issues.
Proficient in managing virtual machines using VMware ESXi to ensure optimum virtualization efficiency and resource utilization.

As a specialist in Hardware/Software Maintenance, I provide comprehensive support to ensure the smooth functioning of critical infrastructures and IT systems. I have expertise in the following areas:

*Maintaining the Intranet to ensure its reliability and efficiency, which facilitates smooth communication and data sharing within the organization.
*Having proficiency in installing and configuring various infrastructure equipment, such as cameras, modems, routers, switches, and servers, to establish robust IT infrastructures.
Proficient in deploying and configuring software systems on workstations to optimize their functionality and productivity.
Providing timely and effective solutions to address issues and challenges faced by workstations, ensuring minimal downtime and seamless operations.
Delivering comprehensive Helpdesk support at multiple organizational levels, assisting users with technical inquiries and efficiently resolving concerns.
Managing user accounts and permissions skilfully through Active Directory, to ensure secure access to resources and data.

details.name: BOE parser
details.description: Small scrapper library and service to load the Spanish BOE auctions into a database, as well as send notifications about new auctions.

details.name: Auto-Stock list
details.description: Stocks listing app to keep track of the stock of items, and predict when the items should be re-stocked.

details.name: MTG Rules (Android)
details.description: Android app to list and search over Magic: The Gathering rules. Published in Google Play. This was made from scratch from the UWP-only app, trying to improve the Xamarin performance and bundle size.

details.name: MTG Rules (UWP)
details.description:
Universal Windows Platform (Windows and Windows Phone) app to list and search over Magic: The Gathering rules. Published in the Windows store.

Discontinued after the end of life of Windows Phone.

details.name: MTG Rules (UWP and Android)
details.description:
Xamarin app (UWP and Android) to list and search over Magic: The Gathering rules. Published in the Windows store and in Google Play. This was made from scratch from the UWP-only app, after the Windows Phone end of life announcment.

Discontinued with the creation of a pure Android solution.
